#summary [psimularor1] System requirements for simulator
#labels Phase-Deploy,Deprecated,psimulator1.0

= WARNING: these informations are for old psimulator1 project =

Simulator is in download section: <br>
http://code.google.com/p/psimulator/downloads/

= Linux =
All utils should be in repositories of your distribution.<br>
On Debian-based distribution (like Ubuntu, ..) install with one command:<br>
{{{ 
aptitude install sun-java6-jre rlwrap telnet 
}}}
If previous command didn't work you have to install by your own way:

 * Java Runtime Environment
 If not in repository, install from:<br>
 http://www.java.com/en/download/


 * rlwrap
 For all features version 0.32+ 
 If not in repository, install from: <br>
 http://utopia.knoware.nl/~hlub/rlwrap/ <br>
 or <br>
 http://snapshot.debian.org/binary/rlwrap


 * telnet
 If not in repository, install from:<br>
 http://snapshot.debian.org/binary/telnet/ 



= Microsoft Windows =
 * Java Runtime Environment
 http://www.java.com/en/download/

Other needed parts are in zip archive in [http://code.google.com/p/psimulator/downloads/ download section] in windows archive.



= Mac OS X =
 * mac ports
 http://www.macports.org/install.php

 * rlwrap
 from mac ports install via:

 {{{
 sudo port install rlwrap 
 }}}
Telnet and JRE is supplied with Mac OS X by default.
